name: joke
author: Termz
command:
import requests
try:
    url = '[https://official-joke-api.appspot.com/random_joke](https://official-joke-api.appspot.com/random_joke)'
    r = requests.get(url).json()
    print(f"Q: {r['setup']}")
    input("(Tekan Enter untuk jawaban...)")
    print(f"A: {r['punchline']}")
except Exception as e:
    print(f'Error: {e}')
